channel.title: Vibe-Coding on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Vibe-Coding on Greg Herlein

item.title: Vibe Coding Book Review
item.description: I don’t like the term “vibe coding.” I strongly prefer “AI-assisted software engineering.” But regardless of what you call it, Gene Kim and Steve Yegge have written a book about it - and their journey from skeptics to true believers is the most interesting part.
